biocontainers.name: crac
biocontainers.summary: Crac is a mapping software specialized for rna-seq data. it detects mutations, indels, splice or fusion junctions in each single read.

biotools.summary: CRAC is a mapping software specialized for RNA-Seq data. It detects mutations, indels, splice or fusion junctions in each single read.
